data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Meerow, Alan W., Cano, Asuncion (2019): Taxonomic novelties in Amaryllidaceae from the Department of Ancash, Peru, and a new combination in Clinanthus. PhytoKeys 131: 115-126, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.131.36160, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.131.36160
